title.rendered: HP Pavilion 14 Ryzen 5 14-inch (35.56 cms) Thin & Light FHD Laptop (8GB/512GB SSD/Windows 10/Microsoft Office/Natural Silver/1.41 kg), 14-ec0035AU

content.rendered:
• Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500U (up to 4.0 GHz max boost clock, 8 MB L3 cache, 6 cores, 12 threads) | Memory: 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB) | Storage: 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD
  • Operating System & Pre-installed Software: Pre-loaded Windows 10 Home with lifetime validity, FREE Upgrade to Windows 11* (when available, refer product description for more details) | Microsoft Office Home & Student 2019
  • Display & Graphics: 35.6 cm (14″) diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080), IPS, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC | AMD Radeon Graphics
  • Ports: 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 10Gbps (USB Power Delivery, DisplayPort 1.4, HP Sleep and Charge), 2 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps, 1 headphone/microphone combo, 1 AC smart pin, 1 HDMI 2.0 | 3-cell, 43 Wh Li-ion Battery, Supports battery fast charge: approximately 50% in 30 minutes
  • Features: Camera: HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera | Microphone: Integrated Dual array digital microphones| Audio: Dual Speakers, Audio by B&O | Keyboard: Full-size backlit keyboard | Alexa Built In | Networking: Intel Wi-Fi CERTIFIED 6 (2×2), Bluetooth 5.2 combo (Supporting Gigabit data rate)

excerpt.rendered: Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500U (up to 4.0 GHz max boost clock, 8 MB L3 cache, 6 cores, 12 threads) | Memory: 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB) | Storage: 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD Operating System & Pre-installed Software: Pre-loaded Windows 10 Home with lifetime validity, FREE Upgrade to Windows […]
